description: Alterations to existing rear extension, including removal of existing roof and gable end to raise the roof height
decision_conditions: The proposal would result in the unacceptable loss of a large Category A TPO tree and damage to two protected Category B trees which make a significant and positive contribution to the character and appearance of the conservation area. The proposal would fail to preserve the character of the conservation area, resulting in less than substantial harm, for which there would be no public benefit to outweigh the identified harm. The proposal would be in conflict with paragraph 196 of the NPPF 2019, Policies DM10 and DM12 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames LDF Core Strategy 2012 and with policy guidance 7 of The Residential Design SPD, 2013.

Site Location Plan - this still does not meet the requirements of the Validation checklist. Please submit a Site Location Plan as follows: A Site Location Plan must be at a scale of either 1:1250 or 1:2500 which identifies the site and the surrounding area and shows at least two roads and the north point. The site should be outlined in red and any other land owned by the applicant in blue. It should include land necessary to carry out the proposed development.
